column5: Aug 13 Billionaire hedge fund manager William Ackman told investors on Wednesday that his firm remains committed to pushing ahead on Valeant's bid for rival Allergan and that the firm is still aiming to list one of its funds on an exchange this year.UPDATE 1-Ackman says he remains committed to Valeant's bid for AllerganAckman says he remains committed to Valeant's bid for Allergan BOSTON Billionaire investor William Ackman is digging in on getting a hostile takeover bid for Botox maker Allergan Inc. done.
